name: Make The Snake | GAD 181 22T3 Minigames
description:
Project Name: Make The Snake

Genre: Minigames

Aesthetic: Steampunk

This project contains 11 short minigames developed by a team of five game development students in 12 weeks.  This project aims to learn the pipeline and workflow of game production, from pitch to deliverable.

All minigames have a simple mechanic that can be controlled by "WASD" and spacebar buttons.

Feedback Forms:

Game Mode
